metadata.title: CVE-2024-24861 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A race condition was found in the Linux kernel's media/xc4000 device driverin xc4000 xc4000_get_frequency() function. This can result in return valueoverflow issue, possibly leading to malfunction or denial of service issue.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.4.0-1133.139').
linux-azure package in trusty is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication.
